json.title: Manager Social Media Marketing
json.description:
SPEED & SPIRIT is what we look for in our candidates, defined by some simple values that inspire us to BE DRIVEN in our performance, BE VIBRANT in our sporting legacy, BE TOGETHER in our team spirit, and BE YOU to let our individual talent and experience shine. Applying for a job at PUMA is easy and all genders are welcome. Simply click APPLY ONLINE and follow the steps to upload your application.

YOUR MISSION:

Position Summary: We are seeking a strategic and creative social media professional to lead PUMA India's presence across platforms like Instagram, X, YouTube, and Pinterest. This role involves developing impactful content, managing influencer collaborations, and driving engagement while ensuring brand consistency. You’ll work closely with internal teams and agencies to execute campaigns, monitor performance, and optimize based on insights and trends.

The ideal candidate will bring a strong understanding of content creation and curation, working closely with design and copy teams to ensure compelling, platform-specific content that reflects the brand's voice and values.

Key Objectives:


 * Social Media Strategy & Management: Develop and implement effective social media strategies to increase brand heat and engagement across all major platforms including Instagram, X, YouTube and Pinterest. You'll manage and oversee PUMA India's social media accounts, ensuring consistent brand messaging and community engagement through timely responses. You will also monitor, analyse, and report on social media performance metrics, adjusting strategies as needed to optimize results.
 * Content Creation & Curation: Create, curate, and manage high-quality, engaging content tailored for various platforms. This includes collaborating with design and copy teams to produce compelling visuals and copy, ensuring all content aligns with brand guidelines and resonates with target audiences. You'll also develop and execute a content calendar for all brand social channels, staying updated on content formats and trends to keep our presence fresh and relevant.
 * Influencer Marketing & Strategic Other Partnerships: Identify, onboard, and manage relevant influencers and agencies who align with campaign goals and brand values. You'll lead the end-to-end execution of campaigns, including planning, outreach, negotiation, briefing, coordination, content approval, and post-launch review. This also involves tracking deliverables, performance, and campaign ROI, while maintaining and nurturing long-term relationships with creators.
 * Collaboration & Analytics: Work closely with internal teams across marketing, product, digital, PR, and finance, as well as external brand and creative agencies, to ensure cohesive execution of marketing campaigns. You'll track performance metrics (engagement, reach, traffic, conversions) for both social media and influencer campaigns, preparing actionable insights and optimizing based on analytics to improve future results and ROI. You will also stay updated on the latest social media trends, tools, best practices, and competitor strategies to provide strategic input.Manage internal and external stakeholders, including agency partners.
   
   

YOUR TALENT:

Qualifications and Functional Competencies:


 * 5+ years of relevant experience in social media management, digital marketing, or brand content strategy
 * Prior experience handling brand accounts with significant scale and engagement across Instagram, X, YouTube, Pinterest
 * Proven track record of managing influencer campaigns and external agency partners
 * Strong portfolio of social campaigns or brand content
   
   

PUMA supports over 19,000 employees across 120+ countries. The PUMA Group owns the brand PUMA, Cobra Golf and stichd, and is headquartered in Herzogenaurach, Germany.

PUMA provides equal opportunities for all job applicants, regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, or disability. Equality for all is one of the core principles at PUMA and we do not tolerate any form of harassment or discrimination.

json.description:

Cure.Fit is looking for data-driven, performance-focused digital marketers for the acquisition and engagement efforts of its fitness services vertical: Cult.Fit. This role involves campaign execution, performance tracking, and optimization across digital platforms. Digital marketing experience in an based business is a plus.

Comfortable with Excel/Google Sheets and data handling.

Strong communication and collaboration skills.

json.title: Retail Marketing Manager
json.description:
About Cult -

Curefit Healthcare Pvt Ltd, founded in 2016, is India’s largest fitness company and wellness platform. Cult, from the house of Curefit, was established with a mission to make fitness easy, fun and accessible to everyone, and has emerged as a community celebrating the joy of fitness. The brand today offers a range of fitness services ranging from group workouts, gyms and personalized fitness solutions, as well as an expansive selection of quality fitness products for the everyday athlete. The company’s vision is to empower everyone towards an active and healthier lifestyle through innovative fitness solutions, enabled by technology.




Summary:

Do you have a passion for retail and a knack for crafting compelling marketing strategies? Then we want you on our team! As our Retail Marketing Manager, you'll be the creative mastermind behind our retail stores, driving brand awareness, boosting sales, and keeping our customers coming back for more.




Responsibilities:

 1. Develop and execute marketing plans: Craft data-driven strategies to attract new customers, retain existing ones, and promote our products across various channels (think social media, email, BTL, ATL and more!)
 2. Content creation magic: From captivating social media posts to eye-catching in-store signage, you'll be the wordsmith and visual artist behind our marketing materials.
 3. Data detective: Analyze customer data and campaign results to understand what's working and what's not, using your insights to optimize future campaigns.
 4. Budgeting boss: Manage the marketing budget efficiently, ensuring every penny spent drives maximum impact.
 5. Relationship builder: Foster strong partnerships with vendors, influencers, and other key players to amplify our reach and success.
 6. Trendspotter extraordinaire: Stay ahead of the curve in the ever-evolving retail marketing landscape, constantly seeking new and innovative ways to engage customers.
 7. Team player: Collaborate effectively with store managers, sales associates, and other departments to ensure seamless execution of marketing initiatives.




Qualifications:

 1. Bachelor's degree in marketing, business administration, or a related field (a bonus if you have a retail background!)
 2. 2+ years of experience in retail marketing, preferably in a similar store type
 3. Proven track record of developing and implementing successful marketing campaigns.
 4. Strong understanding of marketing principles, best practices, and the latest retail trends.
 5. Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a talent for storytelling and persuasion.
 6. Ninja-level analytical and problem-solving skills.
 7. Ability to work independently and as part of a dynamic team.
 8. Proficiency in marketing software and tools (think social media platforms, email marketing tools, and data analytics dashboards).




Benefits:

 1. Competitive salary and benefits package.
 2. Opportunity to make a real impact in a fast-paced and dynamic retail environment.
 3. Work in a creative and collaborative company culture that values your ideas and contributions.
 4. Enjoy exclusive discounts on our products and services.

Nykaa Fashion is seeking a dynamic and creative Assistant Manager – Integrated Marketing to lead multi-channel marketing initiatives across Nykaa Fashion’s Womenswear categories. The role involves strategic brand positioning, performance marketing collaboration, and executing 360-degree marketing campaigns that drive brand awareness, engagement, and sales. The ideal candidate should be adept at brand marketing, campaign execution, and cross-functional collaboration to enhance Nykaa Fashion’s digital and offline presence.




Role Description :







1. Brand Marketing




 * Strategize and implement marketing initiatives to strengthen brands presence on Nykaa Fashion.
 * Conduct competitor analysis to ensure strong positioning and market share.
 * Manage external agency relationships to ensure timely, high-quality campaign execution aligned with Nykaa Fashion’s objectives.
 * Collaborate with creative, business, and external partners to ensure consistent brand messaging across social, performance marketing, CRM (emailers), and on-site assets.
 * Enhance visibility and desirability of products and store experience through engaging social media initiatives.
 * Monitor campaign performance to optimize reach, engagement, and brand growth.




2. Brand Marketing – Global Store




 * Develop and execute an omni-channel marketing strategy for Revolve & Cider on Nykaa Fashion.
 * Conceptualize and build IP campaigns to create brand awareness and customer engagement.
 * Work cross-functionally with design, business, influencer marketing, performance marketing, and CRM teams for multi-channel brand campaigns.

 * Work on static and video content creation for paid marketing campaigns.
 * Oversee creative assets for the Play Store and App Store to enhance app discovery and user acquisition.
 * Deliver key performance marketing assets that drive business objectives.

 * Lead end-to-end execution of brand marketing campaigns across multiple touchpoints – social media, performance marketing, CRM (emailers), and onsite placements.

 * Collaborate with internal teams to develop data-driven marketing strategies that align with business goals.
 * Drive marketing innovation by developing hero content and campaign ideas to enhance brand recall and engagement.

 * 4-6 years of experience in brand marketing, integrated marketing, or digital marketing in fashion, lifestyle, or e-commerce.
 * Strong expertise in brand strategy, campaign execution, and digital marketing channels (social, email, influencers, PR, paid media).
 * Experience managing multi-channel marketing campaigns across both digital and offline touchpoints.
 * Strong analytical mindset to track campaign performance and optimize based on insights.
 * Ability to manage multiple stakeholders and agency relationships.
 * Excellent communication and project management skills.
